topic_descriptions.4: fingerprint, android, bluetooth, biometric fingerprint, reader

sample_docs: Smartly Folded, Powerfully Secured – India's Leading Foldable Boom Barrier Manufacturer At SKN Access Automation, a unit of SKN IoT Technology, we specialize in designing and manufacturing high-performance foldable automatic boom barriers—perfect for low-ceiling basements, parking areas with height restrictions, and complex entry points. Our barriers combine rugged build quality with intelligent automation, enabling seamless vehicle access control without compromising on space or security. Each foldable boom is crafted with advanced motor control, anti-crush sensors, and integration-ready capabilities with RFID, ANPR, and biometric systems. Whether it's a commercial complex, hospital, or residential basement, SKN's foldable boom barriers offer a smart, space-saving solution to manage traffic flow with safety and style. WHAT PEOPLE SAY Mr. Arvind Patel, Facility Manager – Urban Heights Mall SKN's foldable boom barrier is a game-changer for our low-roof basement parking. Smooth operation, stylish design, and perfect for our tight space. Highly recommended! Ms. Lata Sinha, Security Supervisor – Metro Hospitals The installation was seamless and the performance is excellent. The foldable boom handles constant traffic while ensuring safety and security. SKN's support team is also very responsive." new temperature detection machine SKN IOT TECHNOLOGY has brought a new shape technology to our advanced security and face recognition biometric devices to allow with palm and facial recognition, We are adding one new feather to our product list with mask detection and body temperature detection and measurement. These new products can help prevent exposure and contribute to protecting the public from the virus and flu. The newly launched product can recognize body temperature with mask detection can emit an alarm on high temperature. With the facility of providing biometrics attendance to the software where the temperature can be stored with attendance. The temperature detection machine runs on linux based with tcp/ip,wifi/udisk etc. It can be used in Offices ,hospitals,malls etc to safeguard health of our staffs. It has the capacity of face recognition of 5,000. ​ ​ TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION Face / Card / PIN capacity:5,000 Storage capacity:200,000 Recognition way:Face, Card, Password Language: English Self-checking function:Yes Face FAR/ FRR:0.001/0.1(%) Recognition ways:1:1, 1:N CPU:Quad-core, 1.7G OS:Linux IR LED:Yes Infrared Approach receiver:Yes Touch screen:Yes Communication: TCP/IP/USB/Udisk/wifi Working voltage:DC12V - 24V Wide voltage design Ambient light:0-50000Lux Working temperature:0oC-40 oC Working humidity:20-80% Door sensor(EN-MG):Gate magnetic signal input Alarm:Alarm output Exit:Door switch signal input ​ new temperature detection machine SKN IOT TECHNOLOGY has brought a new shape technology to our advanced security and face recognition biometric devices to allow with palm and facial recognition, We are adding one new feather to our product list with mask detection and body temperature detection and measurement. These new products can help prevent exposure and contribute to protecting the public from the virus and flu. The newly launched product can recognize body temperature with mask detection can emit an alarm on high temperature. With the facility of providing biometrics attendance to the software where the temperature can be stored with attendance. The temperature detection machine runs on linux based with tcp/ip,wifi/udisk etc. It can be used in Offices ,hospitals,malls etc to safeguard health of our staffs. It has the capacity of face recognition of 5,000. Face / Card / PIN capacity:5,000 Recognition way:Face, Card, Password Working voltage:DC12V - 24V Wide voltage design Door sensor(EN-MG):Gate magnetic signal input Exit:Door switch signal input

Their systems provide robust security, real-time monitoring, and remote access, ensuring comprehensive surveillance for enhanced safety. Elevate your online presence with our cutting-edge solutions and expertise. It ensures quick response times, patient satisfaction, and efficient coordination among healthcare professionals, enhancing overall patient care and experience.
